text:
@realDonaldTrump Dear #COVIDIOT Mad King Trump:

“The Senate Doesn’t Have Enough Coronavirus Tests”

In a statement @SpeakerPelosi & McConnell appeared to be trying to avoid being seen as receiving special treatment when US testing is so far behind what the country needs.

https://t.co/s9KnFgI2SR
